metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10156 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: A flaw was discovered in the way Ansible templating was implemented inversions before 2.6.18, 2.7.12 and 2.8.2, causing the possibility ofinformation disclosure through unexpected variable substitution. By takingadvantage of unintended variable substitution the content of any variablemay be disclosed.

criterions.comment: ansible: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
